title: Visually Debug, Log and Test an Image Processing Code Using OpenCV and Python
discription: Requirements and Python package implementation for Visually debugging, logging and testing using opencv and python. Logging and testing using opencv-log package

title: Using Multiple Elastic Search in Rails
discription: Configuration Multiple elasticsearch in rails by assigning model specific client.

title: Get Started with Machine Learning in Visual Studio Code and Jupyter
discription: Get started with Machine Learning using Jupyter notebook in Visual Studio Code. Also Execute python file like notebook file using VS Code.

title: Get Started with Machine Learning — Handy Python Tools
discription: Setting up tools like Anaconda, Python, Conda, Jupyter Notebook to get started with Machine Learning in Python. Intro on basic python libraries for analysing, visualizing, training and predicting data

title: Using Machine Learning for Color Calibration with a color-checker
discription: Color calibration with color checker using machine learning techniques.Implementing using  Partial Least Squares, Root Polynomial Regression and 3D Thin plate spline technique in python.

title: Deploying Machine Learning Model to AWS Lambda with Serverless
discription: Deploying machine learning model to aws lambda using serverless framework and its plugin.

title: Deploy Knative Service directly from source code using Kaniko / Ko
discription: Using kaniko and ko, deploy kantive serverless cluster directly from source code without building image locally

title: Get Started with Machine Learning - Part 1
discription: Brief intro about Artificial Intelligence (AI), Data Science and Machine Learning. Simple explanation about Linear Regression and its evaluation metrics. Predicting the weight from height

title: Prediction from Conditionally Dependent Data in Machine Learning
discription: Building a prediction system using Machine Learning from data which have conditional dependence and highly correlated features. Predicted using logistic regression by forming dependency event matrix.

title: Lambda Dependency Management using Serverless Plugin
discription: Deploying python packages to aws lambda layers using serverless requirement plugin

title: Build Your Own Serverless Platform on Kubernetes with Knative
discription: Setup Knative on Google Kubernetes Engine to implement our own serverless environment using containers. Example for creating container for running a go function and deploy it as Knative service

title: Go Modules : Project set up without GOPATH
discription: Through this article, we will see how the project setup and its release goes in Go 1.12 version. Explored  dependency management, package versioning and custom package resolving in Go using Go Modules

title: Real-Time Object Detection with Flutter, TensorFlow Lite and Yolo -Part 1
discription: Implementing real time object detection with on device machine learning using Flutter, Tensorflow Liter and Yolo modal for an Android device

title: Serverless on Kubernetes using Fission
discription: Setup Fission on Google Kubernetes Engine to enable Serverless user case like Lambda like function and Api router. Example for creating python function and rest api with json response using fission

title: Deploying Ruby Script to AWS Lambda Function and Layers
discription: Deploying Ruby function with gem dependencies to AWS Lambda Function and Layer using AWS CLI
